description: The durable Men’s Huntley Bib is ready for gritty hikes, alpine ascents, and everything in between. Paired with 100% seam taping, Gore-Tex® C-Knit™ fabric keeps you dry above tree line, plus offers a soft, quiet exterior. The stretch back panel and articulated knees increase mobility, while Cordura® scuff guards resist abrasions against rock, ice, and dense foliage. Convenient features like adjustable suspenders, a drop seat, separating side zippers, and a thigh pocket let you focus on the adventure.
name: Marmot Huntley Bib - Mens

specs.value: Gore-Tex® Products 3L with Cknit Technology 100% Nylon Plain Weave 3.9 oz
